title: Thursday Post Show (10-28-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (10-28-21)
description:
Bobby starts with a little throwback Thursday with events that all happened on this day in country music. We get into a discussion of laws and regulations. We also found out how much Halloween candy you can eat before you die. Lunchbox also tries the world’s hottest shot. We also talk about should we normalize farting in Yoga.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
